resources.string: You do not have the Berlin map installed yet, but you can install it for free through Google Play.
You have to update the Berlin map to the latest version before you can show stations on the map.
This app is intended to give you the opportunity to explore the Berlin public transportation network. The app is not quite ready yet but already provides some useful information.
The information presented here is taken from the OpenStreetMap project. The data is licensed under the Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL).
